0.Pros: It gave me the opportunity to gain manager experience.

1.Pros: There's some good people, free meal everyday, easy work.
1.Cons: Not a livable wage (obviously), the people doing schedules either overload the place with people or its ran on a skeleton crew. I would recommend this job to 18-20 year olds in college, or highschoolers, but if you don't fit that criteria just look for a different job. Try to make something out of yourself for the love of everything that's holy.

2.Pros: Flexible work schedule for those still in school/ have another job.Offer good job experience as a 1st time employee.Gain customer service experience.
2.Cons: If the store is slow the manager will tell employees to clock out even if it's not the end of your shift.

3.Pros: Fast moving, many many advancement opportunities.

4.Pros: Learned alot about customer service and satisfaction
4.Cons: Not enough support from some managers. Not enough time to properly train crew members. And no harsh punishment for the people who are not trying to improve

5.Pros: The franchisee here does everything they can to help you succeed in this company. Yes, it is a stressful job, but they do all they can to set you up for success.
5.Cons: I really can't think of any. It is a fast food restaurant, so the stress level is always high, but that's to be expected.

6.Pros: Flexible hours until you pick the wrong days off.
6.Cons: Turnover and management are no better than the crew

7.Pros: Friends work there. Good part time job.
7.Cons: The work enviroment, some people that work there.

8.Summary: "Good first step. Not for multiple steps beyond."
8.Pros: Extremely flexible hours.Good first job experience.Teaches you how to work with other people weather you like it or not.Veriety of different jobs to do. Always busy.
8.Cons: Can be extremely monotonous.Opportunity to advance a career at the store level is a joke.Not a pro or a con. Your enjoyment of the job depends on the attitude and competence of your co-workers.You will get burned out quickly so try to stress the need to rotate to different jobs every so often.

9.Summary: "Easy fun work alot of opportunities to move up in your current position."
9.Pros: Fast pace work environment meaning challenges which I love. Got to meet and work with foreign students. Learn the difference of there work culture and our work culture.
9.Cons: When a person moves up to a new position there attitude changes. I understand that but most co-workers didn't and took it differently then I did.
